title: If Only I had a Podcast
content:
Over the weekend I gathered up a mixer, mic and some cables and set to make myself a podcasting-like setup. The mixer is an old Mackie 1202-VLZ Pro, and the mic is an acquired AKG C-3000. All of this, including the cables and stand, was being thrown away by a local television station, and I picked it up for free. It took me a total of 5 hours between Sunday and today to get it working (There was a lot of wiring and rewiring as I reorganized and refactored my cable arrangement). Here's what the end result looks like:

Now if only I had a podcast so I could use all this stuff...
